name: Theme Factory
description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
longDescription: Ships with 10 ready-made themes as individual markdown files: Arctic Frost, Botanical Garden, Desert Rose, Forest Canopy, Golden Hour, Midnight Galaxy, Modern Minimalist, Ocean Depths, Sunset Boulevard, and Tech Innovation. Each theme defines a complete color palette, font stack, and styling rules. Apply any theme to slides, docs, reports, or HTML pages, or generate a custom theme on the fly by describing the mood. Includes a PDF showcase (theme-showcase.pdf) for visual comparison of all 10 themes side by side.
